00001 /*
00002  * Cunlzexe.h
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 29.12.2009
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  *
00007  *  Embedded Extraction Code for all executable files which are lzexed
00008  *  Based on the code of Vesselin Bontchev v0.8.
00009  *  This class is able to extract every exe which is compressed with lzexe
00010  */
00011 
00012 #ifndef CUNLZEXE_H_
00013 #define CUNLZEXE_H_
00014 
00015 #include <vector>
00016 #include <stdint.h>
00017 
00018 typedef uint16_t WORD_16BIT;
00019 typedef uint8_t BYTE;
00020 
00021 class Cunlzexe
00022 {
00023 public:
00024  Cunlzexe();
00025  bool decompress(BYTE *compressed_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata);
00026  unsigned long HeaderSize();
00027  virtual ~Cunlzexe();
00028 
00029 private:
00030 
00031  struct bitstream{
00032    BYTE  *pdata;
00033    WORD_16BIT  buf;
00034          BYTE  count;
00035  };
00036 
00037  void initbits(bitstream *p, BYTE *p_data, unsigned long &inpos);
00038  int getbit(bitstream *, unsigned long &);
00039  int rdhead(BYTE *data_ptr ,int *ver);
00040  void wrhead(std::vector<BYTE> &outdata);
00041  int reloc90(BYTE *p_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata, long fpos);
00042  int reloc91(BYTE *p_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata, long fpos);
00043  int mkreltbl(BYTE *p_data, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata,int ver);
00044  int unpack(BYTE *p_input, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata);
00045 
00046  WORD_16BIT get16bitWord(BYTE *p_data);
00047  void put16bitWord(WORD_16BIT value, std::vector<BYTE> &outdata);
00048 
00049  unsigned long m_headersize;
00050 };
